import React, { useState } from "react"; import "./App.css"; // Import the CSS file import 'react-toastify/dist/ReactToastify.css'; import { ToastContainer, toast } from "react-toastify"; function App() { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ gender: "", age: "", hypertension: "", heart_disease: "", ever_married: "", work_type: "", Residence_type: "", avg_glucose_level: "", bmi: "", smoking_status: "", }); const handleChange = (e) => { setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); const response = await fetch("http://localhost:5000/predict", { method: "POST", headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json", }, body: JSON.stringify(formData), }); const result = await response.json(); console.log("Response:", result); if (result.stroke !== undefined) { toast.success(`Predicted Stroke: ${result.stroke ? "Yes" : "No"}`); } else { toast.error("Prediction failed. Please try again."); } }; return (

); } export default App;
